channel.title: [PI] Running - Help with configs and such?

item.title: [PI] Running - Help with configs and such?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Let me rewrite this. I didn’t like how I worded it.

So my client has 2 run buttons.
The little orb run button, which is case 152. - Will be referred to as “Orb button”
And then the run button within the settings tab, which is case 74214. - Will be referred to as “Run button”

What I would like to happen is that when you turn one of the buttons above on, they both turn on, and vice versa.

But before I get there, I need to fix my run :s

Regardless of what button I click, or what options I have, my character runs :o.

Currently, I only have the Orb button added into my ClickingButtons.java:

			case 152:
				if (c.runEnergy < 1) {
					c.isRunning = false;
					c.getPA().setConfig(173, 0);
					return;
				}
				c.isRunning = !c.isRunning;
				c.getPA().setConfig(173, c.isRunning ? 0 : 1);
			break;

Now, I don’t exactly see an issue, and this code has worked for others (I stole this part from a tutorial).
But it just doesn’t like me I guess.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Running - Help with configs and such?
